mapper.select: select * from (select resul.*, rownum rn from (select talk.*, info.mapx, info.mapy, info.firstimageurl from camptalk talk, camp_info1 info where talk.contentid= info.contentid and talk.area like '%'||#{area}||'%' order by reg_time desc) resul) where rn >= #{rowStart} and rn <=#{rowEnd}
select count(*) from camptalk where area like '%' || #{area} || '%'

select * from (select resul.*, rownum rn from (select talk.*, info.mapx, info.mapy, info.firstimageurl from camptalk talk, camp_info1 info where talk.contentid= info.contentid and talk.area like '%'||#{area}||'%' and talk.writer = #{id} order by reg_time desc) resul) where rn >= #{rowStart} and rn <=#{rowEnd}
select count(*) from camptalk where writer = #{id}

select * from (select resul.*, rownum rn from (select talk.*, info.mapx, info.mapy, info.firstimageurl from camptalk talk, camp_info1 info, talkgoodlist good where talk.contentid = info.contentid and talk.num_talk = good.num_talk and talk.area like '%'||#{area}||'%' and good.writer = #{id} order by reg_time desc) resul) where rn >= #{rowStart} and rn <=#{rowEnd}
select count(*) from talkgoodlist where writer = #{id}

select * from (select resul.*, rownum rn from (select talk.*, info.mapx, info.mapy, info.firstimageurl from camptalk talk, camp_info1 info where talk.contentid= info.contentid and talk.area like '%'||#{area}||'%' and talk.camp like '%'||#{camp}||'%' order by reg_time desc) resul) where rn >= #{rowStart} and rn <=#{rowEnd}
select count(*) from camptalk where area like '%'||#{area} ||'%' and camp like '%'||#{camp}||'%'
select count(*) from camp_info1 where donm like '%'||#{area}||'%' and facltnm like '%'||#{camp}||'%'
mapper.update: update camptalk set good = good +1 where num_talk=#{num_talk}
update camptalk set good = good -1 where num_talk=#{num_talk}
mapper.delete: delete talkgoodlist where writer = #{id} and num_talk=#{num_talk}
mapper.insert: insert into camptalk(num_talk, area, camp, content, reg_time, writer, contentid, ano, sub) values(seq_camptalk.nextval,#{area},#{camp},#{content},sysdate,#{writer},#{contentid},#{ano},#{sub})
mapper.update: update camptalk set content = #{content}, reg_time = sysdate, ano = #{ano} where num_talk = #{num_talk}
mapper.insert: insert into talkqna(num_talkqna, num_talk, content, writer, ano) values(talk_qna.nextval,#{num_talk},#{content},#{writer},#{ano})
mapper.select: select * from talkqna where num_talk = #{num_talk} order by num_talkqna
select count(*) from talknotify where num_talk = #{num_talk} and notifyid = #{sid}

select a.num_talk, a.area, a.camp, a.content, a.reg_time, a.writer, a.ano, a.sub,a.notifycheck, count(*) cnt from camptalk a join talknotify on a.num_talk = talknotify.num_talk where a.notifycheck like '%'||#{check}||'%' group by a.num_talk, a.area, a.camp, a.content, a.reg_time, a.writer, a.ano, a.sub, a.notifycheck having count(*) >= #{count} order by reg_time desc
mapper.update: update camptalk set notifycheck = 'hold' where num_talk = #{num_talk}
